text: Vagari vemugwenga vanoti: “Tinotenda.” Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Hamutendi asi taurai kuti: ‘Tazvipira (muchitendero cheIslaam).’ Nokuti kutenda hakusati kwapinda mumoyo menyu. Asi kana mukateerera Allah uye mutumwa wavo (SAW), havambodzikisi makomborero kana padiki emabasa enyu. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo vanoregerera zvikuru, uye vane tsitsi zhinji.”
